data.description: Very nice 4 bedroom Colonial in great sub with Utica schools.  HUGE kitchen (25x15) with Island, granite counters, double panty, loads of cupboards, blt in buffet & beautiful hard wood floor.  Doorwall  leads out to private yard with brick paver patio, open field & no neighbors behind. Large master BA has separate tub & stahl shower. Main bath has a skylight.Family room has gas FP. Living Rm could be used for dining room right off kitchen or office.  Great size FFL right off garage has cupboards & closet.  Finished basement has loads of closets for a ton of storage.  Home has lots of windows for natural light.  Home comes with a Home Warranty
